question.title: Last Person to Fit in the Bus
question.translatedTitle: 最后一个能进入电梯的人
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Queue (person_id int, person_name varchar(30), weight int, turn int)
insert into Queue (person_id, person_name, weight, turn) values ('5', 'Alice', '250', '1')
